text: is a former Japanese football player. ==Playing career== Ikeda was born in Ibaraki on July 3, 1980. After graduating from Shimizu Commercial High School, he joined J1 League club Urawa Reds in 1999. He played many matches as center back in first season. However the club was relegated to J2 League from 2000. Although he could not play at all in the match in 2000, the club was promoted to J1 in a year. In 2001, he played many matches again. However he could not play at all in the match in 2002. In 2003, he moved to J2 club Shonan Bellmare. Although he played in 2 seasons, he could not play many matches and retired end of 2004 season. ==Club statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | League Cup ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
